inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals 

ULQ: (The skill of Master Un Juhei has no precedent; // who can emulate his painting of gorgeous flowers? // Self-mocking as the ugly one from Wuyan Province, she still expects appreciation from the King of Sai. // In my spare time after lecturing and reading, I paint landscapes and bamboo with rocks for fun. When it comes to flowers and birds with patterned plumage, my awkwardness becomes even worse. A Chance reading of 'Shōzan gafu' by Sū Ikkei made me eager to try my hand. I rushed to gather some rosy pigments and painted a variety of flowers and cut branches. It is deplorable that my brush has turned rusty and the painting appears extremely crude. Compared with professional dyers and paint-workers, however, I may boast certain merits.)
markings: ULQ and L edge: (Shiba Sanjin); (Sekiei Kinka); (Kōsai)
